example.eg: She gathered some shells as souvenirs of the vacation.
example.egtrans: 她收集了一些贝壳作为度假纪念品。

example.eg: We gathered the leaves in piles.
example.egtrans: 我们把树叶集中起来堆成堆。

example.eg: Intelligence agencies are gathering more and more information on our online activities.
example.egtrans: 情报机构正在收集越来越多的关于我们网络活动的信息。

example.eg: I gathered a few wild strawberries to eat.
example.egtrans: 我采了几个野草莓来吃。

example.eg: They gathered the potatoes by hand.
I gather you're not interested in going out tonight.
example.egtrans: 我猜你今晚没兴趣出去。

example.eg: The people gathered for the ceremony.
example.egtrans: 人们聚集起来参与盛典。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 集合, 聚拢, 聚集

example.eg: I gather that you've decided to resign from your post.
example.egtrans: 我推断你已经决定要离职了。

example.eg: You could see the clouds gathering before the storm.
example.egtrans: 暴风雨来临之前，你会看到乌云汇聚。

example.eg: Gather the people together so we can begin the musical program.
example.egtrans: 把大家集合起来，我们好开始音乐节目。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 集合, 召集, 使聚拢

example.eg: Gather your children close to you.
She gathered the fabric at the waistband.
example.egtrans: 她对那块布料进行了收腰处理。

example.eg: Gather round everybody!  Richard has something to say!

dsense.name: collect your thoughts, gather your thoughts

example.eg: He collected his thoughts before he started speaking.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 定了定神, 镇定下来

example.eg: The sheriff left without gathering any evidence from the crime scene.
The farmers were busy gathering in the sheaves.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 势头增强, 势头强劲

example.eg: His bike began to gather speed as he rode down the hill.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 聚合, 集合, 凑在一起
把…凑在一起, 把…集合起来

example.eg: Gather up all the toys and put them in their correct place.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 收集到一起, 汇总, 聚拢

dsense.name: gather up the courage, gather the courage

example.eg: I would ask her to dance if I could gather up the courage.

dsense.name: gather up courage to do [sth], gather up the courage to do [sth], gather the courage to do [sth]

example.eg: Jane is gathering up the courage to ask her boss for a pay rise.
